text: Project Runway is a reality television series where clothing designers compete. It is shown on the Bravo network. The winner of the first season was Jay McCarroll. The winner of the second season was Chloe Dao. The winner of the third season was Jeffrey Sebelia. ==Season 11== Contestants * Emily Pollard * James Martinez * Cindy Marlatt * Joseph Aaron Segal * Matthew Arthur * Benjamin Mach * Tu Suitwat Nakchat * Kate Pankoke * Amanda Valentine * Samantha Black * Richard Hallmarq * Layana Aguliar * Daniel Esquivel * Stanley Hudson * Patricia Michaels * Michelle Lesniak Franklin ===Episodes=== 1\. *Best: Daniel Esquivel *Worst: Cindy Marlatt & Emily Pollard *Eliminated: Emily Pollard 2\. *Best: Layana Aguliar *Worst: Cindy Marlatt & James Martinez *Eliminated: James Martinez 3\. *Best: Daniel Esquivel *Worst: Cindy Marlatt & Benjamin Mach *Eliminated: Cindy Marlatt 4\. *Best: Samantha Black *Worst: Joseph Aaron Segal & Amanda Valentine *Eliminated: Joseph Aaron Segal 5\. *Best: Richard Hallmarq *Worst: Michelle Lesniak Franklin, Daniel Esquivel & Matthew Arthur *Eliminated: Matthew Arthur 6\. *Best: Stanley Hudson *Worst: Benjamin Mach & Amanda Valentine *Eliminated: Benjamin Mach 7\. *Best: Michelle Lesniak Franklin *Eliminated: Kate Pankoke & Tu Suithwat Nakchat 8\. *Best: None *Worst: Richard Hallmarq & Amanda Valentine *Eliminated: Amanda Valentine 9\. *Best: Michelle Lesniak Franklin *Worst: Samantha Black & Richard Hallmarq *Eliminated: Samantha Black 10\. *Best: Stanley Hudson *Worst: Patricia Michaels & Richard Hallmarq *Eliminated: Richard Hallmarq 11\. *Best: Stanley Hudson *Worst: Patricia Michaels & Michelle Lesniak Franklin *Eliminated: None 12\. *Best: None *Worst: Patricia Michaels & Layana Aguliar *Eliminated: Layana Aguliar 13\. *Best: None *Worst: Daniel Esquivel & Stanley Hudson *Eliminated: Daniel Esquivel 14\. *Winner: Michelle Lesniak Franklin *Runners-up: Patricia Michaels & Stanley Hudson Category:American reality television series Category:2004 American television series debuts Category:English-language television programs
title: Project Runway
